sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM YE161090 AA WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CD_VVAL_KRN_CD = 'Y0140000' /* 국세청 */ AND SCXPS_STD_CL_DIV_CD IN ('Y0200010','Y0200020') AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM PDF_C101Y BB WHERE BB.DPOB_CD=AA.DPOB_CD AND BB.YRTX_BLGG_YR=AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND BB.CLUT_SEPT_CD=AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND BB.SYSTEMKEY=AA.SYSTEMKEY AND BB.RESID = AA.FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN )
FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#famResnoEncCntn#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE161090 (DPOB_CD, YRTX_BLGG_YR, CLUT_SEPT_CD, SYSTEMKEY, FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN, CD_VVAL_KRN_CD, SCXPS_STD, SCXPS_USE_AMT, SCXPS_STD_DDC_TRGT_INDV_AMT, SCXPS_STD_CL_DIV_CD, KYBDR, INPT_DT, INPT_ADDR, ISMT, REVN_DT, REVN_ADDR) (SELECT AC02.DPOB_CD, AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR, AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD, AC02.SYSTEMKEY, AC02.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN, 'Y0140000' /* 국세청 */ , AC03.EDU_TP, AC03.EDI_SUM, 0, AC03.EDU_CL, #kybdr#, TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHHMISS'), #inptAddr#, #ismt#, TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHHMISS'), #revnAddr# FROM YE161030 AC02, ( SELECT DPOB_CD, YRTX_BLGG_YR, CLUT_SEPT_CD, SYSTEMKEY, RESID, EDU_TP, EDU_CL, SUM (NVL (EDI_SUM, 0)) AS EDI_SUM FROM (SELECT AA.DPOB_CD, AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR, AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD, AA.SYSTEMKEY, AA.RESID, (CASE WHEN AA.DAT_CD = 'G0004' THEN (CASE WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'H' THEN 'Y0030040' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'J' THEN 'Y0030040' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'K' THEN 'Y0030040' ELSE 'Y0030005' END) WHEN AA.DAT_CD = 'G0006' THEN (CASE WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'H' THEN 'Y0030040' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'J' THEN 'Y0030040' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'K' THEN 'Y0030040' ELSE 'Y0030005' END) WHEN DAT_CD = 'G0007' THEN (CASE WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'H' THEN 'Y0030040' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'J' THEN 'Y0030040' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'K' THEN 'Y0030040' ELSE 'Y0030005' END) WHEN DAT_CD = 'G0008' THEN (CASE WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'H' THEN 'Y0030040' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'J' THEN 'Y0030040' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'K' THEN 'Y0030040' ELSE 'Y0030005' END) ELSE '99999999' END) EDU_TP, (CASE WHEN AA.EDU_CL = 'B' THEN 'Y0200020' ELSE 'Y0200010' END) AS EDU_CL, AA.EDI_SUM FROM PDF_C101Y AA WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND AA.PDF_DAT_APP_YN = 'Y' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM YE161030 AC01 WHERE AC01.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND AC01.YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND AC01.CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND AC01.FAMY_RELA_DIV_CD = 'A0190001' AND AC01.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND AC01.YRTX_BLGG_YR = AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AC01.CLUT_SEPT_CD = AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY AND AC01.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN = AA.RESID) UNION ALL SELECT AA.DPOB_CD, AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR, AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD, AA.SYSTEMKEY, AA.RESID, (CASE WHEN AA.DAT_CD = 'G0004' THEN (CASE WHEN AA.EDU_TP = '1' THEN 'Y0030010' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = '2' THEN 'Y0030020' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = '3' THEN 'Y0030020' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = '4' THEN 'Y0030020' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = '8' THEN 'Y0030010' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'F' THEN (CASE WHEN (CASE WHEN (SUBSTR (AA.RESID, 7, 1)) IN ('3', '4') THEN '20' || SUBSTR (AA.RESID, 1, 6) ELSE '19' || SUBSTR (AA.RESID, 1, 6) END) >= '20110101' THEN 'Y0030010' ELSE 'Y0030020' END) WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'G' THEN (CASE WHEN (CASE WHEN (SUBSTR (AA.RESID, 7, 1)) IN ('3', '4') THEN '20' || SUBSTR (AA.RESID, 1, 6) ELSE '19' || SUBSTR (AA.RESID, 1, 6) END) >= '20110101' THEN 'Y0030010' ELSE 'Y0030020' END) WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'H' THEN 'Y0030040' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'J' THEN 'Y0030040' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'K' THEN 'Y0030040' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'L' THEN 'Y0030020' ELSE '99999999' END) WHEN AA.DAT_CD = 'G0006' THEN (CASE WHEN AA.EDU_TP = '5' THEN 'Y0030030' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = '6' THEN 'Y0030030' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = '7' THEN 'Y0030030' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'C' THEN 'Y0030030' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'D' THEN 'Y0030030' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'E' THEN 'Y0030030' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'H' THEN 'Y0030040' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'J' THEN 'Y0030040' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'K' THEN 'Y0030040' ELSE '99999999' END) WHEN DAT_CD = 'G0007' THEN (CASE WHEN AA.EDU_TP = '1' THEN 'Y0030010' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = '2' THEN 'Y0030020' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = '3' THEN 'Y0030020' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = '4' THEN 'Y0030020' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = '8' THEN 'Y0030010' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'F' THEN (CASE WHEN (CASE WHEN (SUBSTR (AA.RESID, 7, 1)) IN ('3', '4') THEN '20' || SUBSTR (AA.RESID, 1, 6) ELSE '19' || SUBSTR (AA.RESID, 1, 6) END) >= '20110101' THEN 'Y0030010' ELSE 'Y0030020' END) WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'G' THEN (CASE WHEN (CASE WHEN (SUBSTR (AA.RESID, 7, 1)) IN ('3', '4') THEN '20' || SUBSTR (AA.RESID, 1, 6) ELSE '19' || SUBSTR (AA.RESID, 1, 6) END) >= '20110101' THEN 'Y0030010' ELSE 'Y0030020' END) WHEN AA.EDU_TP = '5' THEN 'Y0030030' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = '6' THEN 'Y0030030' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = '7' THEN 'Y0030030' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'C' THEN 'Y0030030' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'D' THEN 'Y0030030' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'E' THEN 'Y0030030' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'H' THEN 'Y0030040' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'J' THEN 'Y0030040' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'K' THEN 'Y0030040' ELSE '99999999' END) WHEN DAT_CD = 'G0008' THEN (CASE WHEN AA.EDU_TP = '1' THEN 'Y0030010' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = '2' THEN 'Y0030020' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = '3' THEN 'Y0030020' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = '4' THEN 'Y0030020' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = '8' THEN 'Y0030010' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'F' THEN (CASE WHEN (CASE WHEN (SUBSTR (AA.RESID, 7, 1)) IN ('3', '4') THEN '20' || SUBSTR (AA.RESID, 1, 6) ELSE '19' || SUBSTR (AA.RESID, 1, 6) END) >= '20110101' THEN 'Y0030010' ELSE 'Y0030020' END) WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'G' THEN (CASE WHEN (CASE WHEN (SUBSTR (AA.RESID, 7, 1)) IN ('3', '4') THEN '20' || SUBSTR (AA.RESID, 1, 6) ELSE '19' || SUBSTR (AA.RESID, 1, 6) END) >= '20110101' THEN 'Y0030010' ELSE 'Y0030020' END) WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'H' THEN 'Y0030040' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'J' THEN 'Y0030040' WHEN AA.EDU_TP = 'K' THEN 'Y0030040' ELSE '99999999' END) ELSE '99999999' END) EDU_TP, (CASE WHEN AA.EDU_CL = 'B' THEN 'Y0200020' ELSE 'Y0200010' END) AS EDU_CL, AA.EDI_SUM FROM PDF_C101Y AA WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND AA.PDF_DAT_APP_YN = 'Y' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM YE161030 AC01 WHERE AC01.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND AC01.YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND AC01.CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND AC01.FAMY_RELA_DIV_CD = 'A0190001' AND AC01.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND AC01.YRTX_BLGG_YR = AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AC01.CLUT_SEPT_CD = AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY AND AC01.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN = AA.RESID)) GROUP BY DPOB_CD, YRTX_BLGG_YR, CLUT_SEPT_CD, SYSTEMKEY, RESID, EDU_TP, EDU_CL) AC03 WHERE AC02.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND AC02.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND AC02.DPOB_CD = AC03.DPOB_CD AND AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR = AC03.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD = AC03.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AC02.SYSTEMKEY = AC03.SYSTEMKEY AND AC02.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN = AC03.RESID)

DELETE FROM YE161090 AA WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CD_VVAL_KRN_CD = 'Y0140000' /* 국세청 */ AND SCXPS_STD_CL_DIV_CD = 'Y0200030' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM PDF_C202Y BB WHERE BB.DPOB_CD=AA.DPOB_CD AND BB.YRTX_BLGG_YR=AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND BB.CLUT_SEPT_CD=AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND BB.SYSTEMKEY=AA.SYSTEMKEY AND BB.RESID = AA.FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN )
FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#famResnoEncCntn#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE161090 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN , CD_VVAL_KRN_CD , SCXPS_STD , SCXPS_USE_AMT , SCXPS_STD_DDC_TRGT_INDV_AMT , SCXPS_STD_CL_DIV_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) (SELECT AC02.DPOB_CD , AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR , AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD , AC02.SYSTEMKEY , AC02.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN ,'Y0140000' /* 국세청 */ , 'Y0030005' , AC03.JOB_EDI_SUM , 0 , 'Y0200030' , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# FROM YE161030 AC02, ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , RESID , SUM(NVL(JOB_EDI_SUM,0)) AS JOB_EDI_SUM FROM ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR , AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.RESID , AA.JOB_EDI_SUM FROM PDF_C202Y AA WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND AA.DAT_CD ='G0005' AND AA.PDF_DAT_APP_YN = 'Y' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM YE161030 AC01 WHERE AC01.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AC01.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AC01.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND AC01.FAMY_RELA_DIV_CD = 'A0190001' AND AC01.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND AC01.YRTX_BLGG_YR = AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AC01.CLUT_SEPT_CD = AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY AND AC01.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN = AA.RESID ) ) GROUP BY DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , RESID ) AC03 WHERE AC02.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AC02.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND AC02.DPOB_CD = AC03.DPOB_CD AND AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR = AC03.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD = AC03.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AC02.SYSTEMKEY = AC03.SYSTEMKEY AND AC02.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN = AC03.RESID )

sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO YE161090 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN , CD_VVAL_KRN_CD , SCXPS_STD , SCXPS_USE_AMT , SCXPS_STD_DDC_TRGT_INDV_AMT , SCXPS_STD_CL_DIV_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) (SELECT AC02.DPOB_CD , AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR , AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD , AC02.SYSTEMKEY , AC02.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN ,'Y0140000' /* 국세청 */ , 'Y0030020' , AC03.SCH_UNI_SUM , 0 , 'Y0200040' , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# FROM YE161030 AC02, ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , RESID , SUM(NVL(SCH_UNI_SUM,0)) AS SCH_UNI_SUM FROM ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR , AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.RESID , AA.SCH_UNI_SUM FROM PDF_C301Y AA WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND AA.DAT_CD ='G0024' AND AA.PDF_DAT_APP_YN = 'Y' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM YE161030 AC01 WHERE AC01.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AC01.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AC01.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
AND AC01.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND AC01.YRTX_BLGG_YR = AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AC01.CLUT_SEPT_CD = AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY AND AC01.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN = AA.RESID ) ) GROUP BY DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , RESID ) AC03 WHERE AC02.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AC02.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND AC02.DPOB_CD = AC03.DPOB_CD AND AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR = AC03.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD = AC03.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AC02.SYSTEMKEY = AC03.SYSTEMKEY AND AC02.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN = AC03.RESID )

DELETE FROM YE161090 AA WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CD_VVAL_KRN_CD = 'Y0140000' /* 국세청 */ AND SCXPS_STD_CL_DIV_CD = 'Y0200050' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM PDF_C401Y BB WHERE BB.DPOB_CD=AA.DPOB_CD AND BB.YRTX_BLGG_YR=AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND BB.CLUT_SEPT_CD=AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND BB.SYSTEMKEY=AA.SYSTEMKEY AND BB.RESID = AA.FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN )
FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#famResnoEncCntn#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE161090 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN , CD_VVAL_KRN_CD , SCXPS_STD , SCXPS_USE_AMT , SCXPS_STD_DDC_TRGT_INDV_AMT , SCXPS_STD_CL_DIV_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) (SELECT AC02.DPOB_CD , AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR , AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD , AC02.SYSTEMKEY , AC02.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN ,'Y0140000' /* 국세청 */ , AC03.SCH_UNI_CD , AC03.SCH_INTT_UNI_SUM , 0 , 'Y0200050' , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# FROM YE161030 AC02, ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , RESID , SCH_UNI_CD , SUM(NVL(SCH_INTT_UNI_SUM,0)) AS SCH_INTT_UNI_SUM FROM ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR , AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.RESID , ('Y0030005') AS SCH_UNI_CD , AA.SCH_INTT_UNI_SUM FROM PDF_C401Y AA WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND AA.DAT_CD ='G0033' AND AA.PDF_DAT_APP_YN = 'Y' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM YE161030 AC01 WHERE AC01.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AC01.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AC01.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND AC01.FAMY_RELA_DIV_CD = 'A0190001' AND AC01.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND AC01.YRTX_BLGG_YR = AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AC01.CLUT_SEPT_CD = AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY AND AC01.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN = AA.RESID ) UNION ALL SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR , AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.RESID , ('Y0030030') AS SCH_UNI_CD , AA.SCH_INTT_UNI_SUM FROM PDF_C401Y AA WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND AA.DAT_CD ='G0033' AND AA.PDF_DAT_APP_YN = 'Y' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM YE161030 AC01 WHERE AC01.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AC01.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AC01.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND AC01.FAMY_RELA_DIV_CD <> 'A0190001' AND AC01.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND AC01.YRTX_BLGG_YR = AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AC01.CLUT_SEPT_CD = AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY AND AC01.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN = AA.RESID ) ) GROUP BY DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , RESID , SCH_UNI_CD ) AC03 WHERE AC02.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AC02.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND AC02.DPOB_CD = AC03.DPOB_CD AND AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR = AC03.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD = AC03.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AC02.SYSTEMKEY = AC03.SYSTEMKEY AND AC02.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN = AC03.RESID )

INSERT INTO YE161090 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN , SCXPS_STD , SCXPS_USE_AMT , SCXPS_STD_DDC_TRGT_INDV_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #famResnoEncCntn# , #scxpsStd# , #scxpsUseAmt# , #scxpsStdDdcTrgtIndvAmt# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE161090 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#famResnoEncCntn# , SCXPS_STD=#scxpsStd# , SCXPS_USE_AMT=#scxpsUseAmt# , SCXPS_STD_DDC_TRGT_INDV_AMT=#scxpsStdDdcTrgtIndvAmt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#famResnoEncCntn#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE161090 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#famResnoEncCntn#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN , SCXPS_STD , SCXPS_USE_AMT , SCXPS_STD_DDC_TRGT_INDV_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE161090 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#famResnoEncCntn#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN , SCXPS_STD , SCXPS_USE_AMT , SCXPS_STD_DDC_TRGT_INDV_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE161090 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE161090 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
